price: هغوى د يو مومن په باب نه خپلوۍ ته ګوري او نه ژمنې ته او همدوى (تل) تېرى كوونكي دي.
arabic: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِي مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illan walā dhimmatan wa-ulāika humu al-muʿ'tadūna
